Package Interface

Class SceneController

java.lang.Object
Interface.SceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseSecretCardController, ChooseStartingCardController, ColorReadySceneController, JoinSceneController, MainBoardSceneController, NameReadySceneController, NetworkSceneController, WaitingSceneController
public abstract class SceneController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Abstract class for SceneController, which contains the scene logic

    • getImageFromCard

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getImageFromCard(CardFace cardFace)
